title: Giles Blunt - Breaking Lorca (Retail)
description:
Giles Blunt - Breaking Lorca - Retail (epub)

A master crime writer trains every weapon in his arsenal on a crime against humanity.

A literary novel that treads fearlessly into one of recent history's most shocking moral crucibles.

In 1980s El Salvador, a young woman is detained in a government torture squad's head-quarters, suspected of supporting guerilla forces. There, a bookish new recruit, Victor PeÃƒÂ±a, is assigned to assist in her interrogation. Before they learn so much as her name -- Lorca -- the squad relentlessly break her, body and soul. It is a terrifying journey into human cruelty and courage, one which years later -- in the pinnacle of cosmopolitan America -- still haunts the tormentor as dramatically as it does his victim.
